member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.ConnectionFactory
member.summary: The RabbitMQ.Client Connection factory to introspect connection properties and create a low-level connection

member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.AutoReconnect
member.summary: Whether Rabbit MQ should auto-retry connecting when a connection to Rabbit MQ Server instance is dropped

member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.RetryCount
member.summary: How many times a message should be retried before sending to the DLQ (Max of 1).

member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.UsePolling
member.summary: Whether to use polling for consuming messages instead of a long-term subscription

member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.KeepAliveRetryAfterMs
member.summary: Wait before Starting the MQ Server after a restart

member.name: F:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.messageFactory
member.summary: The Message Factory used by this MQ Server

member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.RequestFilter
member.summary: Execute global transformation or custom logic before a request is processed. Must be thread-safe.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.ResponseFilter
member.summary: Execute global transformation or custom logic on the response. Must be thread-safe.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.ErrorHandler
member.summary: Execute global error handler logic. Must be thread-safe.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.PriortyQueuesWhitelist
member.summary: If you only want to enable priority queue handlers (and threads) for specific msg types

member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.DisablePriorityQueues
member.summary: Don't listen on any Priority Queues

member.name: P:ServiceStack.RabbitMq.RabbitMqServer.PublishResponsesWhitelist
member.summary: Opt-in to only publish responses on this white list. Publishes all responses by default.
